title: Confession Thread
body:
I'm bored and these are always fun; always learn more about people so let's have another.

I'll start.

When I was growing up young, my stepbrother was the stereotypical high school jock who'd get chicks easily, be actually pretty smart with classes but not do enough work, etc. I guess with this type of setup it lead him to at the time (we're talking early 2000s) listening to a little bit of boy band music.

Since I heard that routinely, my room next to his, I learned the lyrics and when songs like "Bye bye bye" come on the radio I'm automatically forced to sing them; I even remember the songs word for word years after not hearing the songs and I'm like automatically forced to sing.

Lets hear your guys'.

... Also there's multiple hard rock versions of that song and a few others and  I actually really like them '>_>
